```js
import { connectMongoDbAsyncLog, saveToCollectionAsync, collection, deleteCollectionAsyncLog, closeConnection } from 'mongo-quick';
// ────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
(async function () {
  const itemCollection2020 = collection("itemCollection2020", {
    // Here goes your mongoose schema for a model.
    itemModel: String, itemAuthor: String
  })

  console.log(await connectMongoDbAsyncLog())
  // Tip: This automatically picks the database uri of MONGO_DB_URI from .env file.

  await saveToCollectionAsync(itemCollection2020, {
    // Here goes the data you want to save to the collection in mongodb.
    itemModel: 'Some title...', itemAuthor: "Some author name..."
  })

  console.log(await deleteCollectionAsyncLog(itemCollection2020))

  closeConnection()
})();
```
